p: Figure 1 shows the chromatographic profile of the EO extracted with the P. elongata-based nano-emulsions immediately after the process of its preparation ( Figure 1B–D). All replicates were similar to the EO ( Figure 1A), indicating that the nano-emulsification did not affect the overall phytochemical profile of the EO. The CRNE was 1.22 ± 0.03 and corresponded to 94.56% of the CROE, which also indicated that the ratio between the geranial and neral compounds, the two main monoterpenes of the EO, was not altered after the nano-emulsification.
